00022 /*! \file CalvinCHPFileWriter.h Provides classes to write CHP files with expression, genotyping, tag and resequencing data. */

00032 #include <fstream>

00036 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00037 {
00038 
00039 /*! Provides write capabilities for expression, genotyping, resequencing and tag arrays. */
00040 class CHPFileWriter
00041 {
00042 
00043 private:
00044 
00045         /*! The maximum length of a probe set name. */
00046         int maxProbeSetName;
00047 
00048         /*! The file writer. */
00049         GenericFileWriter* writer;
00050 
00051         /*! The data set writer. */
00052         DataSetWriter* dataSetWriter;
00053 
00054         /*! The position of the data entry. */
00055         int32_t entryPos;
00056 
00057         /*! The position of the bg zone entry. */
00058         int32_t bgZonePos;
00059 
00060         /*! The position of the force entry. */
00061         int32_t forcePos;
00062 
00063         /*! The position of the orig entry. */
00064         int32_t origPos;
00065 
00066 public:
00067 
00068         /*! Constructor.
00069          * @param p The CHP file object.
00070          */
00071         CHPFileWriter(CHPData& p);
00072 
00073         /*! Destructor */
00074         ~CHPFileWriter();
00075 
00076         /*! Seeks to the data set. */
00077         void SeekToDataSet();
00078 
00079         /*! Writes an expression result to the file.
00080          * @param p The result to write.
00081          */
00082         void WriteExpressionEntry(const CHPExpressionEntry& p);
00083 
00084         /*! Writes a genotype result to the file.
00085          * @param p The result to write.
00086          */
00087         void WriteGenotypeEntry(const CHPGenotypeEntry& p);
00088 
00089         /*! Writes a universal (tag) result to the file.
00090          * @param p The result to write.
00091          */
00092         void WriteUniversalEntry(const CHPUniversalEntry& p);
00093 
00094         /*! Writes a resequencing result to the file.
00095          * @param p The result to write.
00096          */
00097         void WriteReseqEntry(const CHPReseqEntry& p);
00098 
00099         /*! Seeks to the data set. */
00100         void SeekToBgSet();
00101 
00102         /*! Writes a background zone to the file.
00103          * @param zone The result to write.
00104          */
00105         void WriteBackgroundZone(const CHPBackgroundZone& zone);
00106 
00107         /*! Seeks to the data set. */
00108         void SeekToForceSet();
00109 
00110         /*! Writes a force call to the file.
00111          * @param force The result to write.
00112          */
00113         void WriteForceCall(const CHPReseqForceCall& force);
00114 
00115         /*! Seeks to the data set. */
00116         void SeekToOrigCallSet();
00117 
00118         /*! Writes original call to the file.
00119          * @param orig The result to write.
00120          */
00121         void WriteOrigCall(const CHPReseqOrigCall& orig);
00122 
00123 private:
00124 
00125         /*! Writes the header to the file. */
00126         void WriteHeaders();
00127 
00128         /*! Updates the file positions after a data set is added to the file. */
00129         void SetFilePositions();
00130 };
00131 
00132 }
